items.summary: Replace the placeholder artist identity content with JensyPragya details across the site by updating the central content source (frontend/src/content/artistContent.ts) to reflect: JensyPragya (name), singer and songwriter, emerging pop/kpop artist, currently living in New Delhi, and upcoming album title "Don't Care". Ensure all displayed copy remains in English.

Update the Videos section content to include the user-provided YouTube video link by configuring artistContent.videos to embed the YouTube video with ID "X6QUk9-Qw1c" and set the artist YouTube social link to the exact provided URL https://youtu.be/X6QUk9-Qw1c?si=h4FpM3omCMSQQiSA.
